response.answer_text: Quicqo is a service marketplace which facilitates customers to discover & book trained & verified service professionals at reasonable prices near their location. It operates and serve in 500+ localities in 8 cities in India with 10,000+ authentic service professionals. It helps you to choose the best matched service professional for your tasks. Quicqo went live in 2017 founded by Manish Kaushik & Mohit and growing exponentially. It is the first company also operating in B2B segment with big clientele so far. Whether it is a yoga instructor, interior photographer, food or wedding photographer, dietitian, ac technician Quicqo have all solutions under a single roof. For more details you may check About Quicqo
